description:
A mysterious old man speaks with Team Hokage, imparting sage advice. The next day, a Kurei-less Uruha Crimson shows up to fight Team Hokage... and the first match is the Killer Machine Noroi versus Domon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Terror! The Revived Body of the Dead!!
恐怖!! 蘇った死者の肉体!!
